title: Early Closure of NEL Stations Between Punggol & Serangoon

updates.text: With the early closure of NEL stations between Punggol & Serangoon, train svcs between NE1 HarbourFront & NE12 Serangoon will operate at a longer frequency of about 9 mins while svc hours on the Sengkang-Punggol LRT will be extended on the affected dates. https://t.co/Jp8x47WAPA
